title: @Shift_Volume
description: Tool to shift a dataset in the RAI coordinate system or between MNI anatomical space and MNI space.

rai_shift_vector.title: RAI Shift Vector
rai_shift_vector.description: Move dataset by dR, dA, dI mm (RAI coordinate system)

mni_anat_to_mni.title: MNI Anatomical to MNI Space
mni_anat_to_mni.description: Move dataset from MNI Anatomical space to MNI space (equivalent to -rai_shift 0 -4 -5)

mni_to_mni_anat.title: MNI to MNI Anatomical Space
mni_to_mni_anat.description: Move dataset from MNI space to MNI Anatomical space (equivalent to -rai_shift 0 4 5)

dset.title: Input Dataset
dset.description: Input dataset, typically an anatomical dataset to be aligned to BASE.

no_cp.title: No Copy Flag
no_cp.description: Do not create new data, shift the existing ones (use with caution).
